rows.label: qst000510_msg0001
rows.name:
You've met my mum and dad?
Grr, my stupid brother...

rows.label: qst000510_msg0002
rows.name: So? What did they say, then?

rows.label: qst000510_msg0006
rows.name:
If there's a chance of convincing them,
we owe it to ourselves to try.

rows.label: qst000510_msg0007
rows.name:
I want all the best for you, and
running away is not the best...

rows.label: qst000510_msg0008
rows.name:
But this might just be a ruse,
designed to lure me back...

rows.label: qst000510_msg0009
rows.name:
I really don't think my father will
ever budge...

rows.label: qst000510_msg0010
rows.name:
What if he tries to keep me from
ever seeing you again...?

rows.label: qst000510_msg0012
rows.name:
I don't think you could ever be truly
happy knowing you're making your
family worry about you.

rows.label: qst000510_msg0014
rows.name: Okay. Let's head back into town.

rows.label: qst000510_msg0017
rows.name:
Thank you for bringing the message,
everyone.

rows.label: qst000510_msg0018
rows.name:
We'll give it one last try, just to know
that we did all we could!
